name: dream (itch)
description:
You always have this reoccurring dream. It's almost the same every night.

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D = Movement

Mouse-click = Use

Space = Jump

If at any point you feel lost or unsure of where to go, "head back to the computer for help."

Headphones and dark room recommended.

Short project for class made from a heavy modification of the Unity FPS tutorial.

If the game hangs, wait a few moments. You may have to restart it.

NOTE:

The windows / mac build uses many resources from the unity asset store.

The android build includes many replacements completed by Gui Santos.

--- NEWS ---

March 9, 2016:

Google Cardboard support added (Android)

May 2 2016:

The new version of the game has been added!

A few things you'll notice in this "update":

- Frame-rate unlocked

- Assets from mobile version created by Gui Santos

- Some stability fixes

- Much smaller file size
